Select board_recruit.title as board_recruit_title, enterprise.name AS NAME, resume.title as resume_title, volunteer.date as date, volunteer.result as result
FROM resume,volunteer,board_recruit,enterprise,recruit
resume.resume_id =volunteer.resume_id AND volunteer.board_recruit_id = board_recruit.board_recruit_id AND recruit.recruit_id = board_recruit.recruit_id AND enterprise.enterprise_id = recruit.enterprise_id AND volunteer.individual_id =#{id} AND board_recruit.delete_check =1
ORDER BY volunteer.volunteer_id DESC
